metadata.title: CVE-2024-57654 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the qst_vec_get_int64 component of openlink virtuoso-opensourcev7.2.11 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQLstatements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
